localString.value: A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of adamantine ore. This looks to be the remnants of an old meteorite.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of adamantine ore. This looks to be the remnants of an old meteorite.
Place this object in any area where you want tracking to occur. Set Will to the DC of tracking in this area.
